```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(gganimate)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(rnaturalearthdata)
library(sf)

```

```{r}

# Downloaded from https://feederwatch.org/explore/raw-dataset-requests/

sp <- read_csv('PFW-species-translation-table.csv') 

dat <- read_csv('PFW_2021_public.csv') |> 
  left_join(sp, 'species_code')

glimpse(dat)

```

```{r}

dat |> 
  group_by(species_code) |> 
  summarise(
    n = sum(how_many)
  ) |> 
  arrange(desc(n))

```

```{r}

var_tab <- dat |> 
  mutate(
    date = as.Date(paste(Year, Month, '01', sep="-"), "%Y-%m-%d")
    ) |> 
  group_by(species_code, date) |> 
  summarise(
    lat = median(latitude),
    lon = median(longitude),
    n = sum(how_many)
  )

var_tab_selec <- var_tab |> 
  group_by(species_code) |> 
  summarise(
    min_lat = min(lat),
    max_lat = max(lat),
    sd_lat = sd(lat),
    sd_lon = sd(lon),
    dif_lat = lat[date==as.Date('2020-11-01', "%Y-%m-%d")]-lat[date==as.Date('2021-04-01', "%Y-%m-%d")],
    dif_lon = lon[date==as.Date('2020-11-01', "%Y-%m-%d")]-lon[date==as.Date('2021-04-01', "%Y-%m-%d")],
    n = sum(n)
  ) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  filter(n > 100000) |> 
  arrange(desc(n)) |> 
  top_n(6, abs(dif_lat))

var_tab_selec

```

```{r}

dat |> 
  filter(american_english_name == 'American Robin') |> 
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(longitude, latitude),
    alpha = 0.005) +
  geom_sf(
    mapping = aes(), 
    fill = NA, 
    color = 'black',
    data = world_map)

```




```{r}




loc_filt <- dat |> 
  filter(
    species_code %in% var_tab_selec$species_code,
    between(longitude, -100, -60),
    between(latitude, 30, 55)
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    date = as.Date(paste(Year, Month, Day, sep="-"), "%Y-%m-%d"),
    week = strftime(date, format = "%V")
    ) |> 
  unite('week', c(Year, week), sep = ', week ') |> 
  mutate(week = ifelse(week == "2021, week 53", "2020, week 53", week)) |> 
  group_by(week, species_code) |> 
  mutate(n_2 = n()) |> 
  filter(n_2 > 10) |> 
  group_by(week) |> 
  filter(length(unique(species_code)) == 6)


world_map <- ne_countries(scale = "small", returnclass = "sf", continent = c('North America', 'South America'))
states_map <- ne_states(returnclass = "sf", country = c('United States of America', 'Canada'))


theme_set(theme_few())

p <- loc_filt |> 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_density_2d_filled(aes(longitude, latitude), 
                         color = NA) +
  geom_sf(
    mapping = aes(), 
    fill = NA, 
    color = 'white',
    data = world_map) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(-100, -60), expand = c(0, 0)) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(30, 55), expand = c(0, 0)) +
  theme(
    legend.position = 'none',
    axis.title.x=element_blank(),
    axis.text.x=element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.x=element_blank(),
    axis.title.y=element_blank(),
    axis.text.y=element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.y=element_blank()
  ) +
  facet_wrap(~american_english_name) +
  transition_states(
    week, 
    transition_length = 0,
    state_length = 1
  ) +
  labs(
    title = 'Weekly bird sightings around Northeastern US from November 2020 to April 2021',
    subtitle = '{closest_state}',
    caption = '#TidyTuesday (2023, w2) | Data from Project FeederWatch | Graph by @irg_bio') +
  NULL

animate(p, end_pause = 20, height = 500,
  width = 714, units = "px")

anim_save('final_graph.gif')

```
